pages.title: Swift Boots
pages.text: You have long felt that your speed was, frankly, lacking. Meanwhile every rabbit you try to catch for dinner darts away.
Maybe if you borrow a few parts from that rabbit, add a dark core, mix in some dragon's breath, and hold it all together with emeralds...
As always, you were right. The resulting Traveler's Dark Boots not only sped up your journeys, but also boosted your jump height.
Be sure to thank the local rabbit population that had to be culled...
